tasks.compile-win: deno compile -A --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include worker.ts --output repro-win.exe main.ts
tasks.compile-mac: deno compile -A --target x86_64-apple-darwin --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include worker.ts --output no-issue-mac main.ts
tasks.compile-linux: deno compile -A --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include worker.ts --output no-issue-linux main.ts
